Question
========

A certain brand of granola puts one surprise in each box. There are four possible surprises and each box has an equal chance of containing each surprise to contain. How many possible outcomes are there if you want to get two of the same surprises to get?

Answerlist
----------

* 4
* 12
* 16
* 256

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 4: Correct
* 12: Incorrect
* 16: Incorrect
* 256: Incorrect
